doc:
Graham Moffatt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graham_Moffatt 0 Graham Victor Harold Moffatt (6 December 1919 – 2 July 1965) was an English character actor and comedian who was most active in the 1930s and 1940s. He is best known for a number of films where he appeared with Will Hay and Moore Marriott as 'Albert': an insolent, overweight, overgrown-schoolboy type character, loosely reminiscent of Billy Bunter. Graham_Victor_Harold_Moffatt ( 6_December_1919 – 2_July_1965 ) was an_English_character_actor and comedian who was most_active in the_1930s_and_1940s . He is_best_known for a_number of films where he appeared with Will_Hay and Moore_Marriott as ' Albert ' : an_insolent_,_overweight_,_overgrown-schoolboy_type_character , loosely reminiscent of Billy_Bunter .
